verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. YY <WH3068>, I cry <WH7121> <WH8804> unto thee: make haste <WH2363> <WH8798> unto me; give ear <WH238> <WH8685> unto my voice <WH6963>, when I cry <WH7121> <WH8800> unto thee.
Let my prayer <WH8605> be set forth <WH3559> <WH8735> before <WH6440> thee as incense <WH7004>; and the lifting up <WH4864> of my hands <WH3709> as the evening <WH6153> sacrifice <WH4503>.
Set <WH7896> <WH8798> a watch <WH8108>, O YY <WH3068>, before my mouth <WH6310>; keep <WH5341> <WH8798> the door <WH1817> of my lips <WH8193>.

Incline <WH5186> <WH8686> not my heart <WH3820> to any evil <WH7451> thing <WH1697>, to practise <WH5953> <WH8705> wicked <WH7562> works <WH5949> with men <WH376> that work <WH6466> <WH8802> iniquity <WH205>: and let me not eat <WH3898> <WH8799> of their dainties <WH4516>.

Let the righteous <WH6662> smite <WH1986> <WH8799> me; it shall be a kindness <WH2617>: and let him reprove <WH3198> <WH8686> me; it shall be an excellent <WH7218> oil <WH8081>, which shall not break <WH5106> <WH8686> my head <WH7218>: for yet my prayer <WH8605> also shall be in their calamities <WH7451>.
When their judges <WH8199> <WH8802> are overthrown <WH8058> <WH8738> in stony <WH5553> places <WH3027>, they shall hear <WH8085> <WH8804> my words <WH561>; for they are sweet <WH5276> <WH8804>.
Our bones <WH6106> are scattered <WH6340> <WH8738> at the grave's <WH7585> mouth <WH6310>, as when one cutteth <WH6398> <WH8802> and cleaveth <WH1234> <WH8802> wood upon the earth <WH776>.
But mine eyes <WH5869> are unto thee, O GOD <WH3069> the YY <WH136>: in thee is my trust <WH2620> <WH8804>; leave <WH6168> not my soul <WH5315> destitute <WH6168> <WH8762>.
Keep <WH8104> <WH8798> me from the snares <WH3027> <WH6341> which they have laid <WH3369> <WH8804> for me, and the gins <WH4170> of the workers <WH6466> <WH8802> of iniquity <WH205>.
Let the wicked <WH7563> fall <WH5307> <WH8799> into their own nets <WH4364>, whilst that I withal <WH3162> escape <WH5674> <WH8799>.
